div.p: This case-insensitive code system http://testSK.org/CodeSystem/hemorrhagic-stroke-bleeding-reason-cs defines the following codes:

tr.td: A cerebral aneurysm was identified as the cause of the patient's hemorrhagic stroke
A vascular malformation was identified as the cause of the patient's hemorrhagic stroke
Another, less common or unspecified cause of intracranial hemorrhage was identified

title.value: Hemorrhagic Stroke Bleeding Reason Code System

description.value: Codes indicating the reason for bleeding in hemorrhagic stroke cases.

purpose.value: To provide locally governed codes for the identified cause of bleeding in hemorrhagic stroke.

copyright.value: Â© Tecnomod. This CodeSystem is provided for use within this Implementation Guide.

definition.value: A cerebral aneurysm was identified as the cause of the patient's hemorrhagic stroke
A vascular malformation was identified as the cause of the patient's hemorrhagic stroke
Another, less common or unspecified cause of intracranial hemorrhage was identified
